TITLE: Tips for college students: How to rent your first apartment
SUMMARY: Renting an apartment for the first time is an exciting step into adulthood but you have to make a choice that's right for you — and your budget.

TITLE: Homebuilder sentiment plunges in July as buyers pull back
SUMMARY: Homebuilder sentiment fell dramatically in July, as both builders and buyers contend with sky-high inflation.

SUMMARY: Looking for a safe place to ride out a potential housing storm brought by rising rates and prices? These ten states are the most stable.

SUMMARY: A newly built cliff-side mansion overlooking the Pacific Ocean in Southern California comes with an ambitious $32.5 million asking price.

TITLE: The size of the millennial generation is to blame for sky-high inflation, strategist says
SUMMARY: "The last time we saw what we call 'wolverine inflation' ... was when 75 million baby boomers replaced 44 million silent generation people in the 1970s," Smead said.

SUMMARY: China's housing demand by floorspace is to drop by 2.5% a year over the next 15 years, sales and rental giant Beike predicts.

SUMMARY: More home sellers are dropping their asking prices as rising mortgage interest rates and inflation have eased competition in the market.

SUMMARY: While a growing share of homebuyers walked away from their purchase agreement in June, be sure you know what to expect before joining their ranks.

SUMMARY: Mortgage demand continues to drop, especially for larger loans, as home prices moderate and fewer expensive houses sell.

SUMMARY: With soaring inflation and the possibility of further rate increases, would-be homebuyers may be looking for ways to lower their rates.

SUMMARY: Higher mortgage rates means a higher monthly bill for homebuyers.

SUMMARY: Dubai is seeing its hottest real estate market in years, with sales up 45% year on year in April and 51% in May, according to the Dubai Land Department.

SUMMARY: The order against Cushman & Wakefield came days after a judge lifted a contempt order against former President Donald Trump related to the investigation.

SUMMARY: The historic housing shortage brought on by slow construction and strong demand from buyers in the pandemic is finally starting to ease.

TITLE: Home price increases slowed in April for the first time in months, S&P Case-Shiller says

TITLE: Pending home sales post surprise increase in May, likely due to brief pullback in mortgage rates
SUMMARY: Pending home sales, a measure of signed contracts on existing homes, rose slightly in May, up 0.7% compared with April.

TITLE: Demand for adjustable-rate mortgages surges, as interest rates make biggest jump in 13 years
SUMMARY: Mortgage rates surged to the highest level since 2008, but more buyers applied for loans, perhaps concerned rates would move even higher.
